content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Retrieve the Trend Vision One parameters Procedure Go to Dashboard → Endpoint Security → Endpoint Inventory. Click Agent Installer. Click Deployment Script. Select Endpoint Sensor for Protection type. Select either Linux or Windows for Operating system. In Preview script, copy these values: For Linux: company_id scenario_ids under x86_64 (x86_64_xbc_agent_token) scenario_ids under aarch64 (aarch64_xbc_agent_token) For Windows: AGENT_TOKEN_WIN64 (windows_token) Next steps Set parameter store values. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Retrieve the Trend Vision One parameters
